mema pradesha kendrakaragena maha parimanayen siduwana kasala the jawaramata wata badima sadaha paribhogika adhikariye madihathwima ithamath durwala mattamaka pawathina athara adala wagakiyayuthu ansha pramanawath ayurin kriyathmaka nowime prathipalayak lesa shri lankawe the nishpadanawala jathyanthara kirthinamaya haniwima hethuwen mila pahala yama nisa the karmanthaya muhuna di sitina wathman arbudhaya nirmanaya wimata hethu wu bawayi the karmanthaya aashritha aaranchi marga sadahan karanne.
emenma arabikaraye sancharaye ha makkama wandanawe giya athamun thawamath aapasu meratata nopamini bawath me pilibandawada soya balimata mewanathuruth kriyakara nomathi bawath hethema kiya sitiyeya.
